name: your_rospkg_name_here
description: ROS2 package using rclnodejs, TypeScript (javascript) and node.js

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-tsc && npm run build-colcon && npm run generate-messages
scripts.build-colcon: colcon build --build-base ros --install-base ros && rm -rf log
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ install_support/tmp && npm run clean-colcon
